name: 2048 Gravity
description:
Inspired by Gabriele Cirulli's game available on the web: http://gabrielecirulli.github.io/2048/

Join the numbers to get to the 2048 tile!

Move your phone to move all tiles. When two tiles of the same number touch they merge into one.

Get to the 2048 tile and reach the highscore!

Compete against your friends and the world with the leaderboard app.
